name: Crowned Heads - Sfumato in C Major - Sfumato in C Major
brand: Crowned Heads, Sfumato in C Major
additionalNotes: The Crowned Heads Sfumato in C Major is a 6 3/4 x 48 parejo that uses an Ecuadorian Connecticut hybrid wrapper over an Ecuadorian Sumatran binder and fillers from the Dominican Republic, Nicaragua and Peru. A PCA exclusive limited edition the cigar developed as a mild to medium blend, something Crowned Heads was lacking in their portfolio. The blend delivers an overall medium bodied profile with notes of cream, vanilla and spice. Like many of the company’s lines, it will be made at Tabacalera Pichardo in Estelí, Nicaragua.
